title: Savoury semolina

ingredients.content: 2 whole dried chillies (Kashmiri chillies or long red chillies)
15 - 20 roasted unsalted cashew nuts, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place ghee into mixing bowl and heat <b>2-3 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, until melted.
Add onion, chillies, ginger paste and garlic paste and chop <b>3 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add curry leaves, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and turmeric and cook <b>3 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add tomatoes, peas and salt and cook <b>3 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Add semolina and boiling water and cook <b>1 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>30 sec/100°C//speed 1<b>. Transfer into 6 ramekins or a large serving bowl and garnish with cashews before serving.

hintsAndTricks: To make your own ghee, ginger paste and garlic paste, please refer to the recipes on this recipe chip.
